data.title: Gambling Commission website
data.meta_description:
We license, regulate, advise and provide guidance to the individuals and businesses that
offer gambling in Great Britain, including the National Lottery in the UK
data.text:
Find out about the work we're doing to raise standards in the gambling industry, protect children and the vulnerable and keep crime out of gambling.

Young People and Gambling 2023: Official statistics published

16 November 2023

Understanding the impact of increased cost of living on gambling behaviour published

10 October 2023

Who we are and what we do

Find out more about what we do, what we regulate and who we are in our about us section.

Complaints and queries

Do not use this form for complaints as we will not reply. If you want to complain about a gambling business or need further help please contact us.

User research

If you want to provide feedback about new services and features, join our user research programme.
